minimum_wages.1: Payment of Wages Act - Wages must be paid by 7th of every month
minimum_wages.2: Minimum Wages Act - State-wise minimum wages for different categories
minimum_wages.3: No unauthorized deductions from wages except as permitted by law
minimum_wages.4: Overtime payment at double the rate for work beyond 9 hours/day
minimum_wages.5: Equal pay for equal work regardless of gender

working_conditions.10: Maximum 48 hours work per week, 9 hours per day
working_conditions.11: Weekly holiday mandatory - at least one day off per week
working_conditions.12: Paid annual leave - 1 day for every 20 days worked
working_conditions.13: Maternity leave - 26 weeks paid leave for women employees
working_conditions.14: Paternity leave - 15 days for male employees
working_conditions.15: Safe and healthy working environment mandatory

termination_retrenchment.20: Notice period - 1 month notice or salary in lieu required
termination_retrenchment.21: Retrenchment compensation - 15 days wages for every year of service
termination_retrenchment.22: No termination during maternity leave or medical leave
termination_retrenchment.23: Wrongful termination - reinstatement with back wages
termination_retrenchment.24: Layoff compensation - 50% of wages during layoff period

workplace_harassment.30: Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace Act - Zero tolerance policy
workplace_harassment.31: Internal Complaints Committee mandatory in organizations with 10+ employees
workplace_harassment.32: Complaint must be filed within 3 months of incident
workplace_harassment.33: Inquiry to be completed within 90 days
workplace_harassment.34: Penalties - Up to Rs.50,000 fine and cancellation of business license

provident_fund.40: EPF - 12% employee contribution + 12% employer contribution mandatory
provident_fund.41: Applicable to establishments with 20 or more employees
provident_fund.42: EPF withdrawal allowed for unemployment, medical emergency, housing
provident_fund.43: Pension scheme for employees after 10 years of service

gratuity.50: Gratuity payable after 5 years of continuous service
gratuity.51: 15 days wages for every year of service
gratuity.53: Payable on retirement, resignation, death, or disability

contract_labor.60: Contract workers entitled to same wages as regular workers
contract_labor.61: Principal employer liable for payment if contractor defaults
contract_labor.62: Contract labor cannot be engaged for perennial work
contract_labor.63: Welfare facilities mandatory for contract workers

industrial_disputes.70: Conciliation - Mandatory before strike or lockout
industrial_disputes.73: Illegal strike - Strike without 14 days notice is illegal

employee_benefits.80: ESI - Medical insurance for employees earning up to Rs.21,000/month
employee_benefits.82: Leave encashment on resignation or retirement
employee_benefits.83: Travel allowance, medical reimbursement as per company policy
